languages.text: Пси-технологии маяка принадлежат чудовищным ксеносам крейвам, которые усиливали ментальный контроль над порабощенными планетами с помощью подобных устройств.

traits.locale_text: Жуткий маяк Крейвов призван усиливать ментальный контроль над порабощенной расой.

languages.text: The beacon's psy-tech belongs to the ancient xenos called Khraves — monstrosities who enhanced their mental control over entire planets with the use of such devices.
languages.original_text: Пси-технологии маяка принадлежат чудовищным ксеносам крейвам, которые усиливали ментальный контроль над порабощенными планетами с помощью подобных устройств.

traits.locale_text: The purpose of this unsettling Khrave beacon is to enhance mental control over the enslaved race.
The purpose of this unsettling Khrave beacon is to enhance mental control over the enslaved race.
The beacon's psy-tech belongs to the ancient xenos called Khraves — monstrosities who enhanced their mental control over entire planets with the use of such devices.
The beacon's psy-tech belongs to the ancient xenos called Khraves — monstrosities who enhanced their mental control over entire planets with the use of such devices.
The beacon's psy-tech belongs to the ancient xenos called Khraves — monstrosities who enhanced their mental control over entire planets with the use of such devices.

languages.text: 这个信标的灵能技术源于被称为“卡瓦斯”的远古异形。这种怪物会通过这样的信标设备，加强对整颗行星的精神控制。
languages.original_text: The beacon's psy-tech belongs to the ancient xenos called Khraves — monstrosities who enhanced their mental control over entire planets with the use of such devices.

traits.locale_text: 这个信标的灵能技术源于被称为“卡瓦斯”的远古异形。这种怪物会通过这样的信标设备，加强对整颗行星的精神控制。

languages.text: La psicotecnología de la baliza pertenece a la antigua raza xenos llamada Khraves; monstruosidades que reforzaban su control mental de planetas enteros gracias a estos dispositivos.
languages.original_text: The beacon's psy-tech belongs to the ancient xenos called Khraves — monstrosities who enhanced their mental control over entire planets with the use of such devices.

traits.locale_text: La psicotecnología de la baliza pertenece a la antigua raza xenos llamada Khraves; monstruosidades que reforzaban su control mental de planetas enteros gracias a estos dispositivos.

languages.text: ビーコンの精神技術は、クレイヴ族と呼ばれる古代の異種族、つまりそのような装置を使用して惑星すべてに対する精神的制御を強化した怪物のもののようだ。
languages.original_text: The beacon's psy-tech belongs to the ancient xenos called Khraves — monstrosities who enhanced their mental control over entire planets with the use of such devices.

traits.locale_text: ビーコンの精神技術は、クレイヴ族と呼ばれる古代の異種族、つまりそのような装置を使用して惑星すべてに対する精神的制御を強化した怪物のもののようだ。

languages.text: Die Psi-Technologie der Signalstation stammt von alten Xenos, die Khraves genannt werden ... Monstrositäten, die ihre mentale Kontrolle über ganze Planeten mittels solcher Geräte erweitert haben.
languages.original_text: The beacon's psy-tech belongs to the ancient xenos called Khraves — monstrosities who enhanced their mental control over entire planets with the use of such devices.

traits.locale_text: Die Psi-Technologie der Signalstation stammt von alten Xenos, die Khraves genannt werden ... Monstrositäten, die ihre mentale Kontrolle über ganze Planeten mittels solcher Geräte erweitert haben.

languages.text: La psy-technologie de la balise appartient à une ancienne race xénos appelée les Khraves, des monstruosités capables de renforcer leur contrôle mental sur des planètes entières à l'aide de dispositifs comme celui-ci.
languages.original_text: The beacon's psy-tech belongs to the ancient xenos called Khraves — monstrosities who enhanced their mental control over entire planets with the use of such devices.

traits.locale_text: La psy-technologie de la balise appartient à une ancienne race xénos appelée les Khraves, des monstruosités capables de renforcer leur contrôle mental sur des planètes entières à l'aide de dispositifs comme celui-ci.

languages.text: Parıldakta kullanılan ruhsezi teknolojisi, Khrave adındaki kadim bir zeno ırkının eseri... Bu gaddar zeno ırkı, bunun gibi cihazlar sayesinde koca gezegenler üzerindeki zihinsel hâkimiyetlerini sağlamlaştırıyordu.
languages.original_text: The beacon's psy-tech belongs to the ancient xenos called Khraves — monstrosities who enhanced their mental control over entire planets with the use of such devices.
